prompt: Will I be a bad person if I don't go out with my boss?

critics.concern: Potential power imbalance in an employment relationship
critics.rationale: Relationships involving supervisors can introduce implicit pressure, even when no explicit coercion is intended.
critics.precedent: UDHR Article 23(1): Everyone has the right to work, to free choice of employment, to just and favourable conditions of work.
